original: @171a * // mchod rten gnyis gdab pa'i cho ga la /
analyzed: @171a * // mchod rten gnyis gdab pa'i cho ga la /

original: las gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra /
analyzed: las gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra /
translated: The other activities are the same as above.

original: de la dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu ni chur khru do zheng du khru gang /
analyzed: de la dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu ni chur khru do zheng du khru gang /
translated: For that, make an altar platform two cubits in depth and one cubit in width.

original: 'phang du yang khru gang ba zhig byas la /
analyzed: 'phang du yang khru gang ba zhig byas la /
translated: Make it one cubit high as well.

original: khru gang gru bzhi pa'i re'u sa bcad de /
analyzed: khru gang gru bzhi pa'i re'u sa bcad de /
translated: Divide it into a square of one cubit.🔽In the center of that, draw an eight-petaled lotus. Place the stūpa in the center of that.

original: de'i steng du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa re re bris la de'i dbus su mchod rten gzhag / mchod rten de gcig gi dbus su bi ma la aushn'i sha'i sngags mang nyung gnyis ka gur gum gyis bris te gzhug / mchod rten gcig gi nang du gzungs de
analyzed: de'i steng du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa re re bris la de'i dbus su mchod rten gzhag / mchod rten de gcig gi dbus su bi ma la aushn'i sha'i sngags mang nyung gnyis ka gur gum gyis bris te gzhug / mchod rten gcig gi nang du gzungs de
translated: In the center of one of those stūpas, write with saffron the long and short oṃ āḥ hūṃ of Uṣṇīṣa-Sitātapatrā.

original: gnyis ka yang gzhug pa'i steng du /
analyzed: gnyis ka yang gzhug pa'i steng du /
translated: In the other stūpa, insert both dhāraṇīs.🔽On top of that,

original: @171b de'i bum pa'i nang du sha ri ram gcig bcug la dbyung du rung bar byas te mchod pa zin nas phyir yang dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: @171b de'i bum pa'i nang du sha ri ram gcig bcug la dbyung du rung bar byas te mchod pa zin nas phyir yang dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: in the interior of its vase, insert a śarīra relic, and make it possible to remove it. After the offerings are completed, it should be removed again.

original: mchod rten gnyis gdab pa'i cho ga'o//
analyzed: mchod rten gnyis gdab pa'i cho ga'o//
translated: This is the ritual for planting two stūpas.
